name: Binomia Limited
description: Developer of a mobile application intended to cover the cost of mobile minutes. The company's mobile application lets users cover the cost of their mobile minutes and earn free mobile data by completing crowdsourced tasks, and surveys and by downloading new mobile applications, enabling users to discover new mobile content and earn free airtime to top up a mobile phone.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application intended to cover the cost of mobile minutes. The company's mobile application lets users cover the cost of their mobile minutes and earn free mobile data by completing crowdsourced tasks, and surveys and by downloading new mobile applications, enabling users to discover new mobile content and earn free airtime to top up a mobile phone.
